snippet: Members of Russia’s security services killed four men suspected of being militants when they stormed an apartment building after a tense overnight standoff in the North Caucasus region.
abstract: Members of Russia's security services kill four men suspected of being militants when they storm an apartment building after a tense standoff in the North Caucasus region; Russia is trying to stamp out an insurgency in the region.
lead_paragraph: Members of Russia’s security services killed four men suspected of being militants when they stormed an apartment building after a tense overnight standoff in the North Caucasus region.

headline.main: Russia: 4 Die in North Caucasus Raid
headline.print_headline: Russia: 4 Die in North Caucasus Raid
